I believe you will achieve something great.
It’s just a feeling I have.
ch0177_00_pachira/7101_0701_01_10:
A reporter’s job is to spread information
around the world.
ch0177_00_pachira/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s a very big responsibility, and it’s crucial to
tell the accurate, unbiased truth.
ch0177_00_pachira/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s why I never spread any information that
has even a hint of uncertainty to it.
ch0177_00_pachira/7102_0701_01_10: The whole world has its eyes on Pasio.
ch0177_00_pachira/7102_0701_02_10:

well.
ch0177_00_pachira/7102_0701_03_10:

cutting-edge technology on Pasio.
ch0177_00_pachira/7103_0701_01_10:

approached by people in need of your skills.
ch0177_00_pachira/7103_0701_02_10:

organizations around the world.
ch0177_00_pachira/7103_0701_03_10:
I’ll bet there are some exciting offers coming your
way.

Being “all fired up” means you’re full of motivation,
right?
ch0177_00_pachira/7104_0701_02_10:

out of motivation.
ch0177_00_pachira/7104_0701_03_10:
Fire can be very helpful if you can use it well.
But used incorrectly, it can cause problems.
ch0177_00_pachira/7104_0701_04_10:
I believe those phrases describe the characteristics
of fire very well.

I think you’re the kind of Trainer that uses your

ch0177_00_pachira/2501_0702_02_10:

ch0177_00_pachira/2511_0701_01_10:

participate in Pokémon battles?
ch0177_00_pachira/2511_0701_02_10:

But there’s a reason why you do battle.
ch0177_00_pachira/2511_0701_03_10:

to keep in mind, don’t you?
ch0177_00_pachira/2511_0702_01_10:

ch0177_00_pachira/2511_0702_03_10:
